thread.title: Mrs. H
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Mrs. H

author: Mrs. H
title: Mrs. H
text: I was surprised by how much I enjoy Hello Fresh. We eat meals I would never have planned. There is an ample amount of food. The high quality ingredients are measured for easy assembly. Some take longer to prepare than I would like. However, on those days only a hot, fully cooked meal delivered to my door would be better!
